version_description:
1. Add story animation at game started.
2. New epic dragon egg.
3. New chapter , new scene and new boss , a lot of new challenges.
4. Add a dozen special elite monster.
5. Add new design orbs system.
5. New design orb skills , combine your orbs to learn new orb skills.
6. Epic artifacts.
7. New hero skin.
8. Automatically enter the next stage when pass current mission.

1. Brand new graphic style
2 Enhanced battle experience and more game modes to play
3 New maps, new monsters battle units, new bosses
4. More Dragon Eggs to hatch now!
5. The can-do-everything Nana
6 Gem system added. Forge your own powerful gem with Forge and Synthesis!
7. Endless Mode added. Guess from the name.
8.New Epic Artifacts and new Ancient Ruins dungeon
9. Rumor goes that something amazing will happen once you collect all 6 Orbs
10. Language switch added
